data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.network.session_id contains ""
| filter  xdm.source.ipv4 in($ip) and xdm.source.port in($port)
| comp count() as Requests by xdm.source.ipv4
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal xaxis = xdm.source.ipv4 yaxis = Requests seriescolor("Requests","#0c6105") headcolor = "#ffffff"

dataset = panw_ngfw_threat_raw  
| filter action in($action) and source_ip in($source_ip) and dest_ip in($dest_ip) and severity in($severity) and sub_type in($sub_type) and threat_category != "dns-malware" and threat_category != "info-leak"
| comp count(_id) as Total by threat_category
| sort desc Total
| view graph type = pie show_callouts_names = `true` xaxis = threat_category yaxis = Total headerfontsize = 16

datamodel | filter xdm.alert.original_alert_id ="kerberos_tgs_req" //krb_tgs_data record description
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type = "PRINCIPAL" and xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values in ($name)
| fields xdm.alert.original_alert_id, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.error_code, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.kdc_options, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.padata_prefix, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_expiration, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_prefix

datamodel 
| filter xdm.network.session_id contains ""
| filter  xdm.source.ipv4 in($ip) and xdm.source.port in($port)
| comp count() as Requests by xdm.source.ipv4
| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal xaxis = xdm.source.ipv4 yaxis = Requests seriescolor("Requests","#0c6105") headcolor = "#ffffff"

dataset = panw_ngfw_threat_raw  
| filter action in($action) and source_ip in($source_ip) and dest_ip in($dest_ip) and severity in($severity) and sub_type in($sub_type) and threat_category != "dns-malware" and threat_category != "info-leak"
| comp count(_id) as Total by threat_category
| sort desc Total
| view graph type = pie show_callouts_names = `true` xaxis = threat_category yaxis = Total headerfontsize = 16

widgets_data.title: NIST 800-171 Section 3.5: Identification and Authentication
widgets_data.description: Implement policies and procedures to monitor the identity of users, devices, and processes. Use this widget to query event information to return host data.

data.phrase:
datamodel 
| fields xdm.alert.original_alert_id, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.error_code, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.kdc_options, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.padata_prefix, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_type, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.spn_values, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_expiration, xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.ticket_prefix 
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.msg_type = "TGS_REQ"
| filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_type = "PRINCIPAL" and xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.cname_values contains "*"
